short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity newtab override for a clean, more effective start on the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to help you maximize your productivity by providing a sleek and organized environment to begin your browsing experience. Whether you're a busy professional or just someone who wants a more efficient browsing experience, this extension is the perfect solution for you. 

ClearStartBeta offers a fresh and efficient start to your browser with a productivity-focused newtab page. The clean interface removes any distracting elements and gives you a more focused work environment. This can help increase your productivity and focus by removing the unnecessary clutter found on a typical newtab/homepage.

Update in Version Beta 1.1 -- 
* Added a Google Search Bar at the top of the newtab page for user convenience.
* Fixed a bug on the dynamic calendar which prevented the date to update continuously with usage.
